mapper.select: SELECT sub.NAME SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, meal.* FROM MEALS meal LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY sub on meal.SUB_CATEGORY = sub.ID where meal.CATEGORY = #{categoryId} order by meal.SUB_CATEGORY, meal.SORT
mapper.update: UPDATE MEALS SET CATEGORY = #{meal.category}, SUB_CATEGORY = #{meal.subCategory}, NAME = #{meal.name}, DESCRIPTION = #{meal.description}, INGREDIENT = #{meal.ingredient}, NOTE = #{meal.note}, PRICE = #{meal.price}, IMAGE = #{meal.image}, LIMIT_DATE = #{meal.limitDate}, IS_PUBLIC = #{meal.isPublic} WHERE ID = #{meal.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEALS ( ID, CATEGORY, SUB_CATEGORY, NAME, DESCRIPTION, INGREDIENT, NOTE, PRICE, IMAGE, ADDED_TIME, LIMIT_DATE, SORT, IS_PUBLIC, UPD_TIME ) VALUES ( #{meal.id}, #{meal.category}, #{meal.subCategory}, #{meal.name}, #{meal.description}, #{meal.ingredient}, #{meal.note}, #{meal.price}, #{meal.image}, #{meal.addedTime}, #{meal.limitDate}, #{meal.sort}, #{meal.isPublic}, #{meal.updTime} )

update.foreach: UPDATE MEALS SET SORT = #{meal.sort}, UPD_TIME = #{meal.updTime} WHERE ID = #{meal.id}

mapper.select: SELECT sub.NAME, meal.NAME MEAL_NAME, meal.DESCRIPTION, meal.INGREDIENT, meal.NOTE, meal.PRICE, meal.IMAGE, meal.LIMIT_DATE , meal.SORT FROM MEALS meal LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY sub ON meal.SUB_CATEGORY = sub.ID WHERE meal.CATEGORY = #{categoryId} AND meal.IS_PUBLIC = 1 AND (meal.LIMIT_DATE >= #{today} OR meal.LIMIT_DATE IS NULL) ORDER BY meal.SORT
